org.apache.hadoop.hbase.regionserver.querymatcher

类 ScanDeleteTracker

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.hadoop.hbase.regionserver.querymatcher.ScanDeleteTracker
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    DeleteTracker, ShipperListener

    @InterfaceAudience.Private
public class ScanDeleteTracker
extends Object
implements DeleteTracker
    This class is responsible for the tracking and enforcement of Deletes during the course of a Scan operation. It only has to enforce Delete and DeleteColumn, since the DeleteFamily is handled at a higher level.

    This class is utilized through three methods:

    • add(org.apache.hadoop.hbase.Cell) when encountering a Delete or DeleteColumn
    • isDeleted(org.apache.hadoop.hbase.Cell) when checking if a Put Cell has been deleted
    • update() when reaching the end of a StoreFile or row for scans

    This class is NOT thread-safe as queries are never multi-threaded

    • 嵌套类概要

      • 从接口继承的嵌套类/接口 org.apache.hadoop.hbase.regionserver.querymatcher.DeleteTracker

      • add

        public void add(Cell cell)
        Add the specified Cell to the list of deletes to check against for this row operation.

        This is called when a Delete is encountered.

        指定者:
        add 在接口中 DeleteTracker
        参数:
        cell - - the delete cell

      • isDeleted

        public DeleteTracker.DeleteResult isDeleted(Cell cell)
        Check if the specified Cell buffer has been deleted by a previously seen delete.
        指定者:
        isDeleted 在接口中 DeleteTracker
        参数:
        cell - - current cell to check if deleted by a previously seen delete
        返回:
        deleteResult

      • isEmpty

        public boolean isEmpty()
        指定者:
        isEmpty 在接口中 DeleteTracker
        返回:
        true if there are no current delete, false otherwise

      • reset

        public void reset()
        从接口复制的说明: DeleteTracker
        Called between rows.

      • update

        public void update()
        从接口复制的说明: DeleteTracker
        Called at the end of every StoreFile.

        Many optimized implementations of Trackers will require an update at when the end of each StoreFile is reached.

        指定者:
        update 在接口中 DeleteTracker
